mapper.select:
SELECT A.MENU_ID , A.MNNM_CNTN , #{wk_grp_c} AS GRP_C , MAX(CASE B.BTN_TPC WHEN 'R' THEN NVL(B.AUTH_YN,'0') else '0' end) as AUTH_R , MAX(CASE B.BTN_TPC WHEN 'U' THEN NVL(B.AUTH_YN,'0') else '0' end) as AUTH_U , MAX(CASE B.BTN_TPC WHEN 'C' THEN NVL(B.AUTH_YN,'0') else '0' end) as AUTH_C , MAX(CASE B.BTN_TPC WHEN 'D' THEN NVL(B.AUTH_YN,'0') else '0' end) as AUTH_D , MAX(CASE B.BTN_TPC WHEN 'X' THEN NVL(B.AUTH_YN,'0') else '0' end) as AUTH_X , MAX(CASE B.BTN_TPC WHEN 'P' THEN NVL(B.AUTH_YN,'0') else '0' end) as AUTH_P FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_MENU A, TB_LA_IS_MM_MENU_AUTH B WHERE A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID(+) AND B.GRP_C(+) = #{wk_grp_c} AND A.MENU_ID != '000000'
AND SUBSTR(A.MENU_ID, 0 ,4) = SUBSTR(#{lvl_2_menu_id}, 0, 4)
GROUP BY A.MENU_ID, A.MNNM_CNTN ORDER BY MENU_ID ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_MENU_AUTH WHERE MENU_ID = #{menu_id} AND GRP_C = #{grp_c}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_LA_IS_MM_MENU_AUTH(MENU_ID, GRP_C , BTN_TPC, AUTH_YN, FSRG_DTM, FSRGMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_CMENO) VALUES(#{menu_id}, #{grp_c}, #{btn_tpc}, #{auth_yn}, SYSDATE, #{ss_userid}, SYSDATE, #{ss_userid})
